title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2101.4 - Repayment of loans when a school closes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2101.4 - Repayment of loans when a school closes

State Regulations

Where the default of an educational loan or loans
guaranteed by the corporation has been caused, in the judgment of the
corporation, by the termination of a school during a term in which a student
was enrolled, collection activities may be discontinued without penalty to the
borrower. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2101.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
